item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > PolyMethylMethAcrylateMan > Epic_Scale_Midnight_Talon_Bat_Bolt_Baddies [dl]
item.description:

Collections pour tags :

  • epic infanterie SMC Sm-tactiques SMC-NL SUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5
6
7

R&D had finally had enough of management's shenanigans and decided to take matters into their own hands. The team decided that it was a good idea to try microdosing the shrink ray, but they just ended up shrinking two of the janitors.

When confronted by management, R&D said that they had taken downsizing literally. Once management realized that they could now pay the tiny janitors similarly tiny salaries, they were overjoyed.

The two janitors were not happy, so they decided to stage a hostile takeover of the company. It might take a while though, given that they're only 8mm tall. Their pay was cut, so they're doing this free for the love of the game.

These are two epic scale models with no presupported option. This is a fan made creation inspired by other popular fan art and media.

Justification du tag SUP :

~~~
